param.name: mst_useRTCorrection
param.label: Use RT correction
param.help: Use aligned peakgroup RT to continue threading in MST algorithm. It is highly recommend to set this to 'True'

param.name: mst_Stdev_multiplier
param.label: Standard deviation multiplier
param.help: Turn on adaptive RT tolerances: How many standard deviations the peakgroup can deviate in RT during the alignment (if less than max_rt_diff, then max_rt_diff is used). It is recommended to set this to a value between 2.0 and 4.0.

param.name: mst_useLocalStdev
param.label: Use local standard deviation
param.help: Use standard deviation of local region of the chromatogram. This is experimental and may not work.
